sentences.sContent: The quagga was a strikingly beautiful variant of the zebra.
sentences.sCn: 斑驴是一种极美丽的斑马变种。

trans.tranOther: a recently extinct member of the horse family (Equidae), Equus quagga, of southern Africa: it had a sandy brown colouring with zebra-like stripes on the head and shoulders
